====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]

|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:basal-area-lite-dbh-measures-protocol-shapes:stand-basal-area:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | The value of `tern:featureType` _MUST_ be: http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/1f93a3e8-4c78-4b08-85a4-6869c9ee17ac[`vegetation stand`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _vegetation stand_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
